remarks: The value of the vector to functional map, at the vector, is one. (Contributed by NM, 23-Mar-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hvmapid.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hvmapid.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmapid.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hvmapid.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hvmapid.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hvmapid.i $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` S ) $.
hvmapid.m $e |- M = ( ( HVMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hvmapid.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hvmapid.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
hvmapidN $p |- ( ph -> ( ( M ` X ) ` X ) = .1. ) $.
